text.__SUMMARY__: Aspergillus stromatoides is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. Aspergillus stromatoides produces Calmodulin inhibitors. Many of the strains of Aspergillus stromatoides have been isolated in Thailand.
text.Further reading: Gupta, Vijai Kumar (2016). New and Future Developments in Microbial Biotechnology and Bioengineering: Aspergillus System Properties and Applications. Elsevier. ISBN 9780444635136.
